casebody.data:
Charles C. BUTLER, Personal Representative of the Estate of Harishkumar Patel, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
REINALT-THOMAS CORPORATION, doing business as Discount Tire Company, Defendant,
and
Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158795
COA: 337851 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 20, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellee to substitute Charles C. Butler as the named Personal Representative is GRANTED.
